streams.moveToTrashConfirm: Are you sure you want to move "{{name}}" to trash? You can restore it later.

help.title: Help & Support
help.needHelpDesc: If you have any questions or need assistance with Cloaka, we're here to help. Check out the resources below or contact our support team.
help.faq1q: How do I create a new stream?
help.faq1a: Go to Streams page and click "Create Stream" button. Fill in the required fields and save.
help.faq2q: What's the difference between Redirect and Fingerprint modes?
help.faq2a: Redirect mode performs server-side checks and redirects traffic. Fingerprint mode uses client-side JavaScript for more advanced bot detection.
help.faq3q: How do I restore a deleted stream?
help.faq3a: Deleted streams are moved to Trash where they stay for 30 days. Go to Trash page to restore them.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.aboutDesc: Cloaka is a traffic management and cloaking system designed for affiliate marketers. It helps you filter traffic, detect bots, and route visitors based on various conditions.
docs.featureStreamsDesc: Create and manage traffic streams with custom rules and filters.
docs.featureBotDetectionDesc: Identify and filter bot traffic using fingerprinting and user agent analysis.
docs.featureGeoDesc: Allow or block traffic based on geographic location.
docs.featureVpnDesc: Detect visitors using VPNs or proxies.
docs.featureLogsDesc: Monitor all traffic with detailed logging and analytics.
docs.redirectModeDesc: Redirects allowed traffic to the offer URL and blocked traffic to the white URL.
docs.fingerprintModeDesc: Uses JavaScript fingerprinting for advanced bot detection before routing.
docs.step1: Create a new stream in the Streams section
docs.step2: Configure your offer URL (where allowed traffic goes)
docs.step3: Set up your white URL (safe page for blocked traffic)
docs.step4: Choose detection options (User Agent, Fingerprint, VPN, etc.)
docs.step6: Use the generated stream URL in your campaigns
